summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from a US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) employee, indicating they will be on leave the week of December 28, 2020. The email is a reply to a forwarded news article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days in jail.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article about his final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: USAO SDNY Employee Out of Office
events.description: An employee of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sets an automatic out-of-office reply indicating they will be on leave.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic email reply from an employee of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY).
The email is a reply to a forwarded news article from the New York Daily News titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's final days at NYC jail revealed by inmates'.
The employee was on leave the week of December 28, 2020.
The email indicates ongoing official interest or monitoring of media coverage related to Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
